qos.label: QOS
qos.help: (Optional) The QOS to be used for message exchanges. Default: 0

user.label: Username
user.help: (Optional) The username to use if you want to authenticate incoming traffic.

password.label: Password
password.help: (Optional) The password to use if you want to authenticate incoming traffic.

data_topic.label: Data Topic
data_topic.help: (Optional) The topic to listen to for device data. Default reekoh/data

message_topic.label: Message Topic
message_topic.help: (Optional) The topic to listen to for device messages or commands. Default: reekoh/messages

groupmessage_topic.label: Group Message Topic
groupmessage_topic.help: (Optional) The topic to listen to for group messages or commands. Default: reekoh/groupmessages

authorized_topics.label: Authorized Topics
authorized_topics.help: (Optional) Other, comma-separated, authorized topics the devices can subscribe from and/or publish to.
